name: World War II Combat: Iwo Jima
name_original: World War II Combat: Iwo Jima
description:
World War II Combat: Iwo Jima is an action-shooter game developed by Direct Action Games. It came out on 20-06-2006. Groove Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
World War II Combat: Iwo Jima is available on PC.
